replace_default_agents.description: If true, replaces OpenCode's default agents (plan, build) with only cline-plan and cline-act. If false, adds Cline agents alongside default agents.

default_agent.description: Which agent to use by default when starting OpenCode

plan_model.description: Model to use for cline-plan agent. If not specified, uses the default model from opencode.json

act_model.description: Model to use for cline-act agent. If not specified, uses the default model from opencode.json

plan_temperature.description: Temperature for plan mode (lower = more focused)

show_completion_toast.description: Show toast notification when plan is complete

enable_execute_command.description: Enable /start-act command for quick switching from plan to act mode

enable_plan_approval.description: Enable plan approval workflow. When enabled, plans must be approved using /approve-plan before execution.

prompt_source.description: Source for prompts: 'local' (use local files), 'github' (fetch from Cline repo), 'auto' (cache -> github -> local)

cline_version.description: Cline version to use: 'latest' or specific version/branch (e.g., 'main', 'v1.2.3')

fallback_to_local.description: Fallback to local prompts if GitHub fetch fails
